thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 13 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Betteru Education Provides Update On $100 Million Investment

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Betteru Education Provides Update On $100 Million Investment
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Betteru Education Corp:
* BETTERU EDUCATION CORPORATION SIGNS DEFINITVE AGREEMENT AND PROVIDES UPDATE ON $100 MILLION INVESTMENT
* BETTERU EDUCATION CORP SAYS ‍ON FEBRUARY 1(ST), 2018 TREASURE UNION LIMITED AND CORPORATION EXECUTED A DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT​
* BETTERU EDUCATION - ‍DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT SOLIDIFIES TERMS, CONDITIONS REQUIRED TO COMPLETE FINAL DETAILS FOR US$100 MILLION EQUITY INVESTMENT IN BETTERU​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
